name: biomni-extract-url-content
title: Biomni: Extract URL Content
description: Extract cleaned text content from a webpage using requests and BeautifulSoup. Removes scripts, styles, navigation, and other non-content elements.
content:
Overview

Extract cleaned text content from webpages containing scientific information using requests and BeautifulSoup. Automatically removes scripts, styles, navigation, advertisements, and other non-content elements to provide clean, readable text suitable for analysis.

Input Parameters

  • url (required): URL of the webpage to extract content from

Biological Use Case

Useful for extracting article content from journal websites, research news, blog posts, and other web-based scientific resources. Use cases include: gathering content from journal article landing pages, extracting protocol descriptions from lab websites, collecting data from research group pages, harvesting information from scientific databases and repositories, and processing content from science news and review websites. The cleaned text output is ideal for text mining, content analysis, and information extraction workflows.

Output

Returns a text file (url_content.txt) containing the cleaned, extracted text content from the webpage. All HTML formatting, navigation elements, and extraneous content are removed, leaving only the main textual content.

Category

literature
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python3 prod_apps/biomni/literature/extract_url_content.py --url "${url}" -o "${outputDir}"
